content: Cross the small wooden bridge to find another Rat Soldier below the two Rat Archers, and try to lure him away and out of sight if possible. To take on the archers, make use of your Cloud Step to evade their fire and take out the top targets before working your way down, using your staff spin to deflect while waiting for your Cloud Step to recharge. Beware, as they can also toss grenades that can explode in your face with little warning.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow Wind Ridge'.
The content is as follows:
Cross the small wooden bridge to find another Rat Soldier below the two Rat Archers, and try to lure him away and out of sight if possible. To take on the archers, make use of your Cloud Step to evade their fire and take out the top targets before working your way down, using your staff spin to deflect while waiting for your Cloud Step to recharge. Beware, as they can also toss grenades that can explode in your face with little warning.
